org.vanilladb.core.storage.tx.recovery

Class RecoveryMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanilladb.core.storage.tx.recovery.RecoveryMgr
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionLifecycleListener

    public class RecoveryMgr
extends Object
implements TransactionLifecycleListener
    The recovery manager. Each transaction has its own recovery manager.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecoveryMgr(long txNum, boolean isReadOnly)
      Creates a recovery manager for the specified transaction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecoveryMgr

        public RecoveryMgr(long txNum,
                   boolean isReadOnly)
        Creates a recovery manager for the specified transaction.
        Parameters:
        txNum - the ID of the specified transaction
        isReadOnly - is the transaction read-only

    • Method Detail

      • enableLogging

        public static void enableLogging(boolean log)

      • initializeSystem

        public static void initializeSystem(Transaction tx)
        Goes through the log, rolling back all uncompleted transactions. Flushes all modified blocks. Finally, writes a quiescent checkpoint record to the log and flush it. This method should be called only during system startup, before user transactions begin.
        Parameters:
        tx - the context of executing transaction

      • onTxCommit

        public void onTxCommit(Transaction tx)
        Writes a commit record to the log, and then flushes the log record to disk.
        Specified by:
        onTxCommit in interface TransactionLifecycleListener
        Parameters:
        tx - the context of committing transaction

      • onTxRollback

        public void onTxRollback(Transaction tx)
        Does the roll back process, writes a rollback record to the log, and flushes the log record to disk.
        Specified by:
        onTxRollback in interface TransactionLifecycleListener

      • onTxEndStatement

        public void onTxEndStatement(Transaction tx)
        Specified by:
        onTxEndStatement in interface TransactionLifecycleListener

      • checkpoint

        public LogSeqNum checkpoint(List<Long> txNums)
        Writes a checkpoint record to the log.
        Parameters:
        txNums - the transactions that are being executed when writing the checkpoint.
        Returns:
        the LSN of the log record.

      • logSetVal

        public LogSeqNum logSetVal(Buffer buff,
                           int offset,
                           Constant newVal)
        Writes a set value record to the log.
        Parameters:
        buff - the buffer containing the page
        offset - the offset of the value in the page
        newVal - the value to be written
        Returns:
        the LSN of the log record, or -1 if updates to temporary files

      • logLogicalStart

        public LogSeqNum logLogicalStart()

      • logLogicalAbort

        public LogSeqNum logLogicalAbort(long txNum,
                                 LogSeqNum undoNextLSN)
        Writes a logical abort record into the log.
        Parameters:
        txNum - the number of aborted transaction
        undoNextLSN - the LSN which the redo the Abort record should jump to
        Returns:
        the LSN of the log record, or null if recovery manager turns off the logging
